reference: O.J. Blanchard and M.W. Watson, Bubbles, Rational Expectations, and Financial Markets, in Crises in the Economic and Financial Structure, P. Wachtel, ed. (Lexington, Mass.: Lexington Books, 1982).
B.T. Diba and H.I. Grossman, Rational Asset Price Bubbles, NBFP Working Paper No. 1059, January 1983.
R. Flood and P. Garber, Market Fundamentals Versus Price Level Bubbles: The First Tests, Journal of Political Economy, 88, August 1980, 745-770.
R. Flood, P. Garher, and L. Scott, Further Evidence on Price Level Bubbles, NBER Working Paper No. 841B, January 1982.
G.M. Jenkins and D.W. Watts, Spectral Analysis and Its Applications (San Francisco: Holden-Day, 1968).
L.H. Koopmans, The Spectral Analysis of Time Series (New York: Academic Press, 1974).
T. Sargent, Macroeconomic Theory (New York: Academic Press, 1979).
